description:
The three brothers have finally been thrown out of their apartment. With nowhere else to go, the three go to the park. While there, they overhear a mother reading "The Three Little Pigs" to her child, and the three brothers attempt to recreate the house-building techniques from the book...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Homeless Saviors! They`ll Just Have to Build a House! \ Mars Atta-ttacks! Yuria Sang That Day
Yado Nashi Kyuuseishu! Naraba Ie o Tateru made!! / Mars Attack! Ano Hi no Julia ga Utatte Ita
宿なし救世主! ならば家を建てるまでっ! / マーズアタタック! あの日のユリアが歌っていた
